price: (28) And they say, "When will be this conquest,[1177] if you should be truthful?"
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡفَتۡحُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-fatḥu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
